name: Fallen Star (AyoMakesArt)
description:
The Star has fallen from the sky, into the Girl's back garden. Help the Star get back home! 

Controls: (keyboard and mouse HIGHLY recommended!) 

  • A/S keys - move left and right
  • W key - jump
  • Left click rapidly to push the Star around
  • Right click near an object or enemy to pick it up
  • Hold spacebar to pull the Star closer to the girl

Only the Girl can collect keys, and only the Star can collect starbits.
